title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - HSBC & AWS: Transforming Operational Intelligence (SPS329)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 汇丰银行与AWS：运营智能转型 (SPS329)
abstract: Join HSBC and AWS to explore how organizations can use operational data and Large Language Models to boost release velocity and reduce operational burden during an incident. Discover how HSBC is transforming Change Management with Amazon Bedrock, analyzing historical trends to predict and prevent implementation failures. Learn how to extend this approach into a continuous improvement framework that turns operational data from a passive record into an active tool for risk reduction and service excellence.
abstract_cn: 加入汇丰银行和AWS，探索组织如何利用运营数据和大型语言模型来提升发布速度并减少事故期间的运营负担。了解汇丰银行如何通过Amazon Bedrock转变变更管理，分析历史趋势以预测和防止实施失败。学习如何将这种方法扩展到持续改进框架中，将运营数据从被动记录转变为降低风险和提升服务卓越性的主动工具。
